name: Skull Crush - Match Three Puzzle Game
name_original: Skull Crush - Match Three Puzzle Game
description:
Skull Crush is a match three game that is easy to learn but difficult to master. It is a nonstop blitz of skulls!

The game is simple. Line up three or more identical skulls vertically or horizontally. Earn tons of tokens along the way and use them to buy fun Powerups.

Game Features:

**DIG THE ULTRA-COOL DESIGN**
Check out the sweet graphics and groove to original songs and sound effects as you bust a move, DX style.

**TRY 3 MODES OF GAMEPLAY**
Levels – Test your skills and become the best.
Timed – Match as many animals as you can as the clock winds down.
Endless – Swipe, dash, and crush to your heart's content and earn tons of tokens.

**EARN COOL POWERUPS**
Chameleon – Create any animal to help with your matching mania.
Magic Net – Eliminate all of one type of animal tile in one big blast!
Platypus Trap – Catch the Platypus and get him off the screen.
Clues – Find elusive matches and solve the puzzle.

**CHOOSE A BACKGROUND**
Pick from Loose in the City, Arabian Nights, Grassy Knoll, The Outback, and Outer Space!

**MAKE THE SKULLS LAUGH**
Match four skulls to make one laugh. Match two more tiles with the laughing one, and watch all the adjacent tiles pop!

**PROVE YOUR PROWESS**
Play to beat your high score, earn tokens, and redeem them for helpful Powerups on your way to match3 mastery.
